articles.author: Fatos Bytyci
articles.title: Armed men storm Kosovo village, Serbian Orthodox monastery; policeman killed - Reuters
articles.description: Gunmen in armoured vehicles stormed a village in Kosovo on Sunday, battling police and barricading themselves in a Serbian Orthodox monastery in a resurgence of violence in <a href="/world/europe/nato-soldiers-deploy-around-kosovo-town-halls-standoff-with-ser…
articles.content: NORTH MITROVICA, Kosovo, Sept 24 (Reuters) - Gunmen in armoured vehicles stormed a village in Kosovo on Sunday, battling police and barricading themselves in a Serbian Orthodox monastery in a resurge… [+3183 chars]
